revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Broadcom_BCM94322AG |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Broadcom |model = BCM94322 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = AG |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = August 15, 2016 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Broadcom_BCM94322AG |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = N150 |series = BCM94322 |if = Mini PCI |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = (half)
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4322; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Pertains to Broadcom BCM94323 as well
*Single-chip all-in-one die Baseband/MAC/Radio for 2x2 802.11n applications *Advanced 65 nm CMOS process for lowest power consumption and highest integration *Fully compatible with 802.11n Draft 1.0 and 802.11a/b/g legacy devices. :802.11n Draft 2.0 compliant Wi-Fi solution. *Two transmitters and two receivers with optional 802.11n. :Draft 2.0 modes allow data rates supporting 300 Mbps. *Flexible two and three antenna configurations for improved range and performance *Support for optional 802.11n features for improved rate, range performance *Greenfield preamble *Space Time Block Code (STBC) *Short Guard Interval *Multiple Host Interfaces supported: PCIe, PCI, mPCI, USB 2.0 (BCM94323 only) *Integrated ARM Cortex M3 CPU for USB host offload *Low RBOM count and optimal packaging for cost effective PCB designs *High-performance 802.11a/b/g/n features standard across the Intensi-fi and AirForce product lines *OneDriver - Single driver across platforms simplifies driver update process and improves customer satisfaction *BroadRange *Afterburner high-speed modes *High-performance whole home coverage *SecureEasySetup and Wi-Fi protected set-up for simple wi-fi setup and security configuration *WPA/WPA2 *Cisco Compatible Extensions (CCXv4, CCXv5) *Full-rate AES engine in hardware *WMM for quality of service
[[Category:English Documentation]]
